title: QR Code Generator
description: Turn any URL or text into a QR Code instantly. Useful for quick mobile sharing.
helper: Enter text to generate a QR Code immediately.

openGraph.title: QR Code Generator
openGraph.description: Free Online QR Code Generator. Instantly convert URLs, text, emails, and more into high-quality QR codes. No sign-up required, completely free to use. Download your QR codes as PNG images or share them directly. Create lifetime valid QR codes for personal and business use without expiration.
